snippet: The vote was 91 to 7 for Marilyn B. Tavenner, acting leader of the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services since December 2011.
abstract: Senate approves Marilyn B Tavenner, Pres Barack Obama's nominee to run Medicare and Medicaid, in decisive 91-to-7 vote, providing agency with its first confirmed chief in six and a half years.
lead_paragraph: The vote was 91 to 7 for Marilyn B. Tavenner, acting leader of the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services since December 2011.

headline.seo: Marilyn Tavenner Confirmed as Medicaid and Medicare Chief
headline.main: Acting Chief Wins Confirmation to Run Medicare and Medicaid
headline.print_headline: Acting Chief Wins Confirmation To Run Medicare and Medicaid

keywords.value: Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services
keywords.name: organizations
